tool_description: retrieve image, price, weapon, class for every released Skin in CS:GO or CS2
name: cs-skin API
title: cs-skin API

api_list.name: Random Skin from Weapon
api_list.description:
retrieve name, price, icon, class and weapon for a random counterstrike skin from a specific weapon
(prices for field tested condition in USD)

(replace weapon_name)

Example: /api/random/AWP
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cs-skin-api.p.rapidapi.com/random/AWP"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cs-skin-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://cs-skin-api.p.rapidapi.com/random/{weapon_name}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cs-skin-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Specific Skin
api_list.description:
retrieve name, price, icon, class and weapon for a specific counterstrike skin 
(prices for field tested condition in USD)

(replace skin_name, underscores instead of spaces)

Example: /api/AK-47_Redline
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cs-skin-api.p.rapidapi.com/AK-47_Slate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cs-skin-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
